DOC.brief_summary: This study consist two part . The first part study look absorption three different polyphenol preparation blood , variability absorption whether absorption could enhance mix pollen shell . For purpose 12 healthy volunteer recruit . All participant receive 3 supplement without mix pollen shell total 3 test . For test six blood sample take 8 hour period . Urine sample also collect . Oligopin select first study . The second part study aim look effect Oligopin endothelial function assess vascular tone function healthy volunteer use non-invasive , direct measurement vasodilatory capacity ( EndoPAT ) . Nitrate nitrite measurement , well blood pressure measurement , also record provide clear clinical assessment effect preparation ( ) upon vascular function . The effect Oligopin compare placebo ( methylcellulose-filled capsule ) allow robust assessment clinical effect . A total 24 healthy volunteer recruit study .
DOC.brief_title: Absorption Profiles Three Polyphenol Preparations With Without Pollen Shell Covering
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist two part . The first part study look absorption three different polyphenol preparation blood , variability absorption whether absorption could enhance mix pollen shell ( pollen shell show enhance lipid molecule absorption ) . For purpose 12 healthy volunteer recruit . All participant receive 3 supplement without mix pollen shell total 3 test . For test six blood sample take 8 hour period . Urine sample also collect . Oligopin select first study . The second part study aim look effect Oligopin endothelial function assess vascular tone function healthy volunteer use non-invasive , direct measurement vasodilatory capacity ( EndoPAT ) . Nitrate nitrite measurement , well blood pressure measurement , also record provide clear clinical assessment effect preparation ( ) upon vascular function . The effect Oligopin compare placebo ( methylcellulose-filled capsule ) allow robust assessment clinical effect . A total 24 healthy volunteer recruit study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male Female subject age 1865 speak understand English 2 . No concomitant medication include herbal medicine food supplement 3 . No concomitant disease process 4 . Body Mass Index 21 29kg/m2 5 . Systolic blood pressure â‰¤150 mm Hg diastolic pressure < 90 mm Hg 6 . Subjects give informed consent 1 . Patients wish allow disclosure GPs . 2 . Concomitant medication include herbal medicine food supplement 3 . Concomitant disease process 4 . History drug/alcohol abuse Alcohol intake within 24 hour dose visit ( visit 24 ) 5 . Body Mass Index < 21 > 29kg/m2 6 . Systolic blood pressure > 150 mm Hg diastolic pressure > 90 mm Hg 7 . Unable tolerate polyphenol product adhere low polyphenol diet 8 . Vegetarian 9 . Subjects willing able fast 12 noon ( total 14 hour ) . 10 . Pregnant female plan conceive next 3 month . 11 . Participation study currently last three month .
